page.title: 16Health in Queensbury.
page.content: QUEENSBURY ISNT A HEALTHER PLACE THAN BRADFORD BECAUSE THE ILLNESSES ARE NOT THE SAME AND IT DOESNT JUST EFFECT THE OLD IT EFFECTS THE VERY YOUNG JUST AS MUCH.THERE ARE ONLY SIX DOCTORS IN QUEENSBURY AND THREE OF THEM ARE FEMALE.OUT OF THEM THERE IS A MIDWIFE WHO ONLY GOES TO VISIT PEOPLE WHEN ITS REALY IMPORTANT.IF NOT THEY AFTER CAME TO THIS HEALTH CENTRE BECAUSE THERE IS HEALTH CENTRE BECAUSE THERE ARE NO HOSPITALS IN QUEENSBURY.IN WINTER ALL THE DOCTORS FIND IT HARD TO VISIT PEOPLE BECAUSE OF THE SNOW ON THE GROUND SOMTIMES IT GETS SO BAD BECAUSE ITS SO HIGH UP.
